item.title: Search underway for murder suspect who walked away from prison work camp: Authorities
item.description: The Idaho Department of Correction said it is searching for Kevin Nicholas Kuintzle, 33, a resident of the St. Anthony Work Camp in Fremont County.

item.title: Manslaughter charge dismissed in Daniel Penny trial, jury to consider homicide charge
item.description: The jury was 'unable to come to a unanimous vote' on Daniel Penny's manslaughter charge over the subway chokehold death of Jordan Neely.
